means: 解除，释放( unchain的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Li Yuhe was put into the prison, but his ambition was unchained.
sentence.Network_cn: 李玉和被投入大牢, 但他的雄心壮志是关不住的.

sentence.Network_en: The author once was an unchained treacherous adolescent.
sentence.Network_cn: 暗夜行路》的作者曾经是一名不甘受束缚的叛逆青年.

sentence.Network_en: Technology has advanced so much that people can now take their work with them, unchained cubicles.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于科学技术突飞猛进, 人们在自己的家中就可以用上面提到的东西来完成公司的工作.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 注解：就是大虚。第四十九话：unchained翻译：解放
in unchained mode , a transaction is implicitly started before any data retrieval or modification statement .在非链接模式下,事务在任何数据检索或修改语句前隐式启动。

list.abs: 可惜朋友群里没人对决杀令（Django Unchained）有兴趣，不然今天想去看。而且奇怪的是，看他越久，就越容易被他吸引，越想了 …
